name: OCDis OCDat
description:
Get into the shoes of someone that suffers from OCD and fix his day!

Made with Unity for the Global Game Jam 2020

Amit Netanel | programming, mascot

Amit Katz | 2D art, game design

Ben Goldstein | 2D art, game design 

Moshe Gilboa | 2D art, game design
